tasks.task: Construct a three-bin composter using pallets
subtasks: Acquire pallets from a nearby plumbing supply outfit
Arrange two pallets vertically at each end and one in the middle to form three bins
Use bailing wire to secure the pallets in place
Loop wire through the pallet slats, twist, and tighten with pliers or nippers
Remove loose ends and flatten them for safety
Repeat the wire securing process on both the top and bottom of the pallet structure
